name: Bullet Bubble
description:
It is a game made in a week, it is a bullet hell 3d for 2 players, with 3 maps, I hope you like it and if so I hope your support.

W A S D or Arrows to move on the menus

G or Numpad 1 to enter in options 

G or Numpad 1 To shoot

Esc(Escape) To Go back in the menus and Pause the game
